You can sort the Inventory Model list by `Updated Date` and `Documentation Updated Date`.

You can now sort the Model Inventory page by `Updated Date` or `Documentation Updated Date` in ascending or descending order using the existing sorting logic in `src/pages/ModelInventory/index.tsx`.
